version_description:
• enemy spawn issues fixed
• flight recording fixed
• cockpit look center (auto/manual) switch
• FOV zoom available in auto-center mode
• A-10 cannon aiming higher now
• A-10 rough landing ability (up to 140kts max)
• A-10 cockpit improvements and some model fixes
• F-16 gun sound changed
• F-16 gatling gun has 511 as in real
• F-16 fuel consumption increased
• fast propeller effects
• elevator deflection tweaked
• rudder sensitivity lowered
• overal sensitivity tweaked
• flight models tweaked for better handling
• many other bugs fixed

• added original (old) controls option
(you can switch between original controls and new one in pause menu)
• virtual joystick is bigger now
• tweaked missile explosions
• CCIP bombing fixed precision
